item.title: Why Bob Marley Should Not Have Acted As His Own Attorney

item.description:

the fu superior:

Whenever I say jamal on IRC you say “where is the nigger”

Well he isn’t staff now is he?

item.title: Why Bob Marley Should Not Have Acted As His Own Attorney
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:6, topic:254055”][quote author=Bebe link=topic=335615.msg2612962#msg2612962 date=1230858637]

[quote author=Pwnd link=topic=335615.msg2611314#msg2611314 date=1230773298]

Yeah, he shot the sheriff, but he did it in self defence…
[/quote]He’s black, they should have lynched him.

[/quote]WUT STAFF BEING RACIST?[/quote]
Whenever I say jamal on IRC you say “where is the nigger”

Read full topic
